entry.title: nba
entry.content: LeBron - James in 2003 first round first pick overall by Cleveland in his career so far played only a Cleveland team.James has a very good basketball talent,physical fitness Madden,a very high basketball IQ,breaking sharp,shooting regarded as a relatively technical weakness,but to enter the alliance has been progress,the small emperor has a point guard better than an ordinary field of vision and passing technology.Defensive end lateral moves are relatively poor,single theory of physical fitness,you can Control in any position other than center.Draft:The 2003 first-round NBA draft pick for No.1 overall by the Cleveland Cavaliers selected.
